title: Italian-style chicken and chick peas
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '425g passata', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons sugar', '1 bay leaf', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1 (410g) tin chick peas, drained and rinsed']
